channel.title: Troubles with Coordinates
channel.description: I can't figure out how to see my coordinates at all times. I don't want a command that gives me my coordinates, I know how to do this. What I need is to have it show my coordinates somewhere so I don't have to type in commands every 5 seconds. I know some clients or servers (not sure which it has to do with) have it listed where the weight of carried items should be. That's what I need.

item.title: Troubles with Coordinates
item.dc:creator: @_Articuno `Articuno
item.description:
@_Articuno wrote:

I can’t figure out how to see my coordinates at all times.
I don’t want a command that gives me my coordinates, I know how to do this.
What I need is to have it show my coordinates somewhere so I don’t have to type in commands every 5 seconds. I know some clients or servers (not sure which it has to do with) have it listed where the weight of carried items should be. That’s what I need.

Read full topic
